--- Cesare Polenghi <cepo@...> wrote:
> I have two ideas:
> 
> (1) We start a "become-a-samurai" camp next summer,
> somewhere in Japan. 
> I am dead-serious!!! Let's find a small village in
> Tohoku, or in 
> Kyushu, a couple of serious Japanese sensei to teach
> martial arts and 
> Zen, and a couple of American teachers to lecture on
> history and let's 
> do it!! -- I am all for it! (I am going back to
> Japan for the summer 
> anyway). Sounds like a lot of fun, right ?!!??
> 
> (2) Alternatively, I suppose we better send a "FAQ"
> on "Samurai and 
> reality" to all the new subscribers. I mean, "The
> Last Samurai" has 
> been out only THREE days, and...
> 
> cepo, honolulu
> 
>
